artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: tall green roofed building, blackballs on roofs; center section hexagonal with center panel wider than side sections; “BAN/QUE" above green door; three sets of windows high on each side and on center section
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [BANQUE]
title: Banque, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
